short_summary: Satellite imaging and image processing service
description: The Government of Canada (GC) has a requirement for S-AIS data services for monitoring of Canadian, East Asian, and Global maritime traffic that can also be queried for historical tracking purposes.
full_summary:
# Satellite AIS (S-AIS) Data Services Request for Proposal
## Request Reference Number and Title
- **Reference Number:** WS4067273547
- **Title:** SATELLITE AIS (S-AIS) DATA SERVICES

## Tender Details
- **Publication Date:** August 31, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 10, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2023
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User:** Canadian Space Agency (CSA)

## Service Description
The Government of Canada requires satellite AIS (S-AIS) data services for:
- Monitoring maritime traffic in Canada, East Asia, and globally
- Querying historical tracking purposes
Services must detect and process Class A and B AIS signals from vessels worldwide and deliver AIS messages usable by the Government of Canada.

## Selection Criteria and Tender Process
- **Tender Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Evaluation Criteria:** Highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget

## Supporting Documents and Contact Information
- **Statement of Work:** Annex A
- **Contracting Entity Contact:** Dalia Bahidj (PSPC/SPAC) - dalia.bahidj@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Amendment to Tender Closing Time
Amend the closing time for the tender notice in SAP Ariba: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17324279. All required documentation and bid submissions must be received by October 10, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.

Note: Since the provided text does not provide any `Operational Reserve Plan` or `Marine Assets Board`, I did not include them in the rewritten entry. Also, I did not translate the text as per the original request. If you need me to translate it, let me know. 

Let me know if this is what you are looking for.
